title: JUMBO Sponges For Car Cleaning, 4PCS Washing & Windows - 4 Pack Of Car Sponges - Anti Scratch Technology - Perfect For Wheels, Windscreen & Bodywork (4PCS (Yellow + Blue）)
features: 【Jumbo Car Sponge】Extra large sponge thickness (height) reaches 6.5cm (2.56in), product size 22.5*11*6.5cm (8.9*4.3*2.56inches), large size hand-held sponge and bucket with the use of better cleaning power.

【Non Scratch Design】Car sponge clean your cars windows, wheels & bodywork with ease with the Sumwitum Jumbo Car Sponge Pack. Featuring an XL surface area which quickly and efficiently removes grit and dirt from your car.

【Compression Process】 We use compression design and process can be easy to carry without taking up volume, independent packaging is convenient for you to travel with,just soak it in water when you use it.
【Durable for use】 Reusable polyester sponge is soft and durable, not easy to deform, not easy to be broken.
【Multipurpose】Can be used not only for cars, but also for cleaning other surfaces including boats, RVs, motorbikes and more.

【Perfect Gift】 Must have car wash kit, Super absorbent, unique microfibre mesh technology prevents scratches and scuffs on your car's paintwork. Give our high quality car wash sponge to your family or friends,. Wash and maintain your car like a pro.
description: 【Large Size】 1.8in thick all-purpose sponge, The huge sponge is soft and strong, when detergent or soap is used, it can produce richer foam than cloth. 【Jumbo Car Sponge Size:】 22.5*11*6.5cm (8.9*4.3*2.56inches) 【What you get】2pcs yellow Sponge,+2pcs blue Sponge 【Multipurpose】: Can be used not only for cars, but also for cleaning other surfaces including boats, RVs, motorbikes and more. 【Steps to use】 Step 1 Placed in Water Step 2 Place in water for a few minutes Step 3 Quickly recovers jumbo sponge shape
